Name: ndp
Description: Package ndp implements the Neighbor Discovery Protocol, as described in RFC 4861.  MIT Licensed.

Name: homelab
Description: Configuration management for Matt Layher's machines. MIT Licensed.

Name: schedgroup
Description: Package schedgroup provides a goroutine worker pool which schedules tasks to be performed at or after a specified time. MIT Licensed.

Name: corerad
Description: CoreRAD is an extensible and observable IPv6 Neighbor Discovery Protocol router advertisement daemon. Apache 2.0 Licensed.

Name: genetlink
Description: Package genetlink implements generic netlink interactions and data types. MIT Licensed.

Name: netlink
Description: Package netlink provides low-level access to Linux netlink sockets. MIT Licensed.

Name: wgipam
Description: Command wgipamd implements an IP Address Management (IPAM) daemon for dynamic IP address assignment to WireGuard peers, using the wg-dynamic protocol. Apache 2.0 Licensed.

Name: untappd
Description: Package untappd provides an Untappd APIv4 client, written in Go. MIT Licensed.

Name: wgdynamic-go
Description: Package wgdynamic implements a client and server for the the wg-dynamic protocol. MIT Licensed.

Name: mdlayher.com
Description: Matt Layher's personal static website. MIT Licensed.
